mainDescription: We have been providing professional carpet cleaning services in Tashkent for 10 years, so we know how to clean carpets properly and with quality.
whyChooseUsCard1Description: Applications are accepted 24 hours a day. If you need urgent carpet cleaning, we can arrive immediately. Nevertheless, the quality remains perfect.
whyChooseUsCard2Description: Our staff performs each process thoroughly: receiving carpets, preparing for cleaning, full cleaning, drying, and final inspection.
whyChooseUsCard3Description: Choose a time that is convenient for you, and contact us for carpet cleaning. We guarantee you effective and efficient results.
infImageTitle: 10% Discount for Areas 30 m² and Above!
infImageDescription: Take advantage of our services and get a 10% discount for areas 30 m² and above! Simplify the cleaning process today and enjoy a more comfortable life in a clean environment.
workProcessDesc1: Call or leave a request on the website (we'll clarify the details and provide the price).
workProcessDesc2: Order carpet cleaning at home or in the factory.
workProcessDesc3: We will sign a formal contract and start the work.
workProcessDesc4: We will pick up your carpets for free.
workProcessDesc5: We clean and wash carpets using German equipment.
workProcessDesc6: We dry carpets without deformation or odor.
workProcessDesc7: We will deliver your carpets at a convenient time for you.
workProcessDesc8: The best guarantee is our reputation, which we value! Trust us!
comment1: There were stains on the carpets, and I thought nothing could remove them. But this service amazed me – the stains completely disappeared! Highly recommend.
comment2: I gave my carpets for cleaning and am very satisfied with the result. The carpets came back perfectly clean! Fast and quality service. Thank you!
comment3: My carpets were dusty and had an odor. I can't believe they look like new after this cleaning! Excellent service and great customer care.
comment4: Amazing work! My carpets look brand new again. Super fast service and very friendly staff.
comment5: Very professional cleaning! They removed even the toughest stains. Definitely recommend to everyone!
comment6: The best carpet cleaning service I’ve ever used! They care about every detail. Will use again for sure!
faqTitle1: How long does washing carpets take?
faqDesc1: The carpet washing process usually takes 3-5 days. During this time, carpets are deeply cleaned, dried, and prepared for delivery.
faqTitle2: How is the price of your services determined?
faqDesc2: Prices are determined based on the size, material, and cleaning level of the carpet. We often provide prices based on square meters. For special orders, additional information is required to determine the price.
faqDesc3: No, our experienced specialists and modern equipment guarantee that carpets will not be damaged. We apply special cleaning methods suitable for each type of carpet.
faqTitle4: What cleaning products do you use during the washing process?
faqDesc4: We use environmentally friendly and safe cleaning products for humans and animals. These products deeply clean carpets without causing damage.
faqTitle5: Is there a carpet pickup and delivery service?
faqDesc5: Yes, we pick up and deliver your carpets for free at a convenient time for you. You only pay for the washing service.
faqDesc6: We wash many types of carpets, including wool, silk, and synthetic carpets. However, for very delicate or antique carpets, we apply special cleaning methods or recommend alternative cleaning methods.
